name: Whispering Foothills
story: The road east through the barren expanse that separates the civilized world and World's End has been rough and unforgiving.
After three weeks travel, your destination is in site. The dim lights of a tavern are barely visible in the distance.
Legend has it that the Whispering Foothills are named after the whispers of all the dead slave miners.
Others say it's from the quiet roar of the Argent Falls many miles away at World's End.
You don't hear anything but the rustle of the of the tall, golden grass in the gentle breeze and the occasional wolf pack howling.
Regardless, you are weary from weeks of hard solitary travel east.
You have sensed a danger about this place - increasing as you've travelled east.
You loosen your short sword at your side...
The job you picked up in Brist said to find World's End Tavern at the foot of the Whispering Foothills.
observe_details: Rolling plains transition to gentle slopes of the Whispering Foothills.
You see a dim light off in the distance.

landmarks.name: World's End Tavern
discovery_details: A haphazardly constructed tavern sits along the road just inside the first foothills.

landmarks.name: Abandoned Mine
discovery_details: The black maw of an large abandoned mine is visible over the crest of a small cliff face.
